page.title: 12Huntley- A Peaceful Village
page.content: Huntley is a village on the A40 approximately half-way between Ross-on-Wye and Gloucester. In the main part of the village there are 107 detached and 80 semi- detached houses;105 detached and 36 semi-detached bungalows and 19 cottages. Many houses were built in the 1970's. Some of the roads are named after fruits and trees,such as Bramley Drive and Oak Way. There is a Village Hall where numerous activities go on. Huntley has a Public House called the 'Red Lion'.There is a little plant and vegetable shop and a butcher's shop.There are orchards surrounding the area. Altogether Huntley is a peaceful place with pleasant surroundings and most of us enjoy living here.
